mapper.select: SELECT n.NOTICE_CODE,n.NOTICE_TITLE,n.NOTICE_CONTENT,TO_CHAR(n.NOTICE_DATE,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분"') AS NOTICE_DATE, n.NOTICE_IMG,a.ADMIN_CODE,a.ADMIN_ID,a.ADMIN_PW,a.ADMIN_NAME FROM NOTICE n join ADMINS a on n.admin_Code = a.admin_Code WHERE n.ADMIN_CODE = #{ adminCode } AND n.NOTICE_CODE = #{ noticeCode }
SELECT COUNT(NOTICE_CODE) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_CODE > 0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(NOTICE_CODE) DESC) NUM, A.ADMIN_CODE,A.NOTICE_CODE,A.NOTICE_TITLE,A.NOTICE_CONTENT,TO_CHAR(A.NOTICE_DATE,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분"') AS NOTICE_DATE, A.NOTICE_IMG, b.admin_Name FROM NOTICE A join ADMINS b on A.admin_Code = b.admin_Code ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(NOTICE_CODE)) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(NOTICE_CODE) DESC
SELECT DISTINCT ADMIN_CODE FROM NOTICE WHERE ADMIN_CODE = #{adminCode}
SELECT * FROM NOTICE ORDER BY ADMIN_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE VALUES ( #{ adminCode },(SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(NOTICE_CODE)),0)+1 FROM NOTICE), #{ noticeTitle }, #{ noticeContent }, TO_DATE( #{noticeDate} ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{noticeImg} )
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = #{ noticeTitle }, NOTICE_CONTENT = #{ noticeContent } , NOTICE_DATE = TO_DATE( #{noticeDate} ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), NOTICE_IMG = #{noticeImg} WHERE ADMIN_CODE = #{ adminCode } AND NOTICE_CODE = #{ noticeCode }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM NOTICE WHERE ADMIN_CODE = #{ adminCode } AND NOTICE_CODE = #{ noticeCode }
